name: Volleyborne: Unbound Horizons
description:
Volleyborne : Unbound Horizons is a first person volleyball game that is grounded in reality, and provides the most immersive experience in any sports game ever. Anything that can be done in real life volleyball will (hopefully) be possible in-game. Additionally, the controls are very physics based and hardcore, almost to the point of a simulation. 

The game will NOT be easy to pick up, but players are expected to get better and feel the similarities to playing real volleyball as they get better. Players will have to re-learn the timing of their jumps and position themselves according to the ball's location by themselves.
